The Lemmings find a crate of mini building-blocks which enables them to build a hammer... and any other object they wish!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Its a beautiful day at the beach. Bean breathes in the salty air, bliss - and not another soul in sight. What could possibly spoil his perfect day? Answer: British weather. Mr. Bean finds himself chasing an illusive ray of sunshine across town, over hills and dales, a football stadium and the English Channel.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is shocked when Teddy receives a birthday card from Beans girlfriend, Irma Gobb. The bears Birthday had completely slipped his mind. And what do you get for the teddy that has everything? A morning in a toy shop, burgers for lunch and a slap up tea party, of course. (But only if you can afford it.)

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants an ice cream from the ice cream van. But by the time he gets to the front of the queue the ice-cream man has gone to lunch. Bean takes it upon himself to climb through in an open window and into the back of the van from where he starts to help himself. Unfortunately he soon attracts a crowd and is forced to serve a long queue of kids until all the ice cream runs out. When the ice-cream man comes back from lunch and drives away he is unaware that Bean is still hiding in the back of his van en route to the ice cream factory.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is feeling very left out when he discovers that Mrs Wicket is having a huge party downstairs and apparently he isnt invited. Bean tries every trick in the book to sneak himself into the party - even resorting to hiding inside an enormous cake. If only he knew the real reason for the celebration.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Beans attempt to cut the grass is thwarted by a pesky root which refuses to budge. When Mr Bean breaks his spade he heads to the local Garden Centre to find a replacement. But instead of simply buying one he enters a gardening competition to win one - judged by none other than the Queen herself! Its gardening gloves off when Mr Bean goes into battle with his rival green-fingered competitors.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Irma are off for a day at the seaside. Irma is travelling light but Bean wants to take almost everything his owns in an enormous trunk. Arriving at the seaside Beans trunk gets accidentally swapped with a trunk belonging to a famous stage magician. As Bean entertains Irma pulling rabbits out of hats the angry magician arrives on the scene - and hes not a happy bunny.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean loves playing in the neighbourhood soft play centre - bouncing on the trampolines whizzing down the slides and most of all immersing himself in the ball pool. But he doesnt like sharing the place with all those annoying kids. So Bean decides to turn his flat into his own private play area where he can play in peace. Unfortunately Irma Mrs Wicket and The Bruisers all want to join in the fun with him.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean orders a takeaway pizza but when it arrives he feels let down by the size of it. So he sets out to bake his own unique Teddy shaped pizzas. Under the name Pizza Bean his pizzas become extremely popular and very soon business in booming. As a result rival pizza producer Don Crustyoni sees his profits plummeting and decides to make Mr Bean an offer he cant refuse.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is not allowed to fly off on holiday as his passport has no photograph. After failing to get one from a photo booth he tries numerous other ways to get his photo taken including photobombing a tourists snap. None of these work but after Bean is arrested maybe the police can assist him. Say cheese!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants to impress Irma by entering them both into a dance competition at the local park. But his tango is terrible and his rumba ridiculous so he enrols for lessons at a local dance school. After an unsuccessful class at the dance studio and a trip to the library to teach himself Mr Bean has lost track of time. He needs to make it up to a disgruntled Irma but will his homemade effort "win" her over.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean manages to get himself locked in a department store overnight while spending too long trying on clothes. Bean takes advantage of the situation having fun in the various departments. But when he discovers a robbery taking place the fun and games stop as the desperate burglar chases Bean from floor to floor and all around the store.

programme.title: Ole ikka lahe, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Daphne always dreamed of meeting extra-terrestrial life but that dream becomes a nightmare when the gang gets caught up in the mystery of a scary Alien Monster and brought to Area 53 - a government facility so secret, its two numbers greater than Area 51!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput, The Docs, The Thief and Droopy are all approaching the end of a typical day - the Docs are chasing Lamput, the thief has achieved the perfect gallery art heist and Droopy has finished his day at the office. But an unexpected collision causes confusion when their briefcases get muddled up and they each end up with each others belongings. Its not long before they find out about the mistake, but who has whose stuff? And how will they get it back?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs pursuit of Lamput takes them to the North Pole, where Lamput is taking photographs of arctic wildlife. The Docs decide to disguise themselves as various animals to get close to Lamput, only to be thwarted each time by the same animals theyre pretending to be, including a polar bear mother and her cub.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: A freak accident causes Lamput to grow giant in size! The two Docs must find a way to deal with this gargantuan problem and catch him roaming the big city!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy has got it into his head to offer a butterfly to the she-bear hes in love with. But the Lemmings fight with him over the rare specimens hes spotted, for they want to play helicopter. The butterfly hunt is on!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Joonisfilm raagib grislikarust nimega Grizzy ja mitmest lemmikust.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Joonisfilm raagib grislikarust nimega Grizzy ja mitmest lemmikust.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Unwilling to share the food both he and the Lemmings are wild about, Grizzy locks it up inside the rangers brand new and apparently burglar-proof safe. He watches the Lemmings vain attempts to open the safe with amusement, until he realizes that the string around his neck with the key is far from indestructible.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy is impressed by the TV show of a magician who transforms a partridge into a bouquet of flowers. To get rid of the Lemmings once and for all, for they exasperate him with their incessant games, Grizzy tries the magic trick on them. And apparently... it works!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Joonisfilm raagib grislikarust nimega Grizzy ja mitmest lemmikust.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Joonisfilm raagib grislikarust nimega Grizzy ja mitmest lemmikust.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean forgets the golden rule: never fall asleep in the bath when youve got a chicken in the oven. So what romantic meal can he quickly rustle-up for his luckless girlfriend, Irma Gobb? The cheese from the mousetrap? The flower from the vase? A meal is eventually provided by an uninvited guest.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The nasty tennis player is big and angry and wants his ball back. The one Mr. Bean managed to throw on the roof of a house across the road. Paralysed with vertigo sixty feet up on a windowsill, he is eventually brought to earth by the helpful intervention of a neighbours pet gerbil.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean ends up in a farm slurry pit after racing a tractor. The car smells, Teddy smells, Bean smells … bad. He comes home, determined to clean all three. A determination that winds up with him locked outside, on the roof and completely stark naked.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Its Irmas birthday. Bean buys a bargain-bin load of cards, and writes out two - one nice, one silly. He gets his envelopes mixed up and sends off the wrong card. He tries to persuade the postman to hand the card back, but no luck. He winds up causing chaos at the sorting office in a last-ditch attempt to avoid Irmas ire.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean breaks his bed using it as a trampoline. He tries to fix it, but he cant. Next morning, and after an awful nights sleep, he goes to buy a brand-new bed. He has fun trying all the beds out, but the one he wants is too expensive. He is about to get thrown out of the shop when he turns his experience of all the beds to his advantage.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean drives her and Miss Wince to their booked spa retreat; and wait outside in the car until theyre done. Bean gets bored, so bored that he decides to sneak into the spa and get Mrs. Wicket and Miss Wince out. Chased by the irate Receptionist, Bean gets more than he bargained for when he crashes into Mrs. Wickets massage session.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan into raising money for the local donkey sanctuary. He tries to thwart Declans success and increase the amount of money hes raising until eventually he finds himself challenging Declan to a sky-diving competition.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The Great Eduardo, violinist supreme, is in town and Irma wants to go to the concert. But Bean wont pay for the tickets. More than that, he claims that he can play the violin better. Now he has to prove it. After a lot of painful sawing, even Eduardo cant bear the noise. He offers to teach Bean, who ends up replacing him in the concert!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Miss Wince takes Mrs. Wicket off on holiday in her brand-new, swanky caravan; and Bean is left behind. But never one to let a setback knock his confidence, he decides to build his own caravan and sets off in search of the perfect quiet spot. All would be well if hed only not built the caravan out of Mrs. Wickets garden shed …

programme.title: Silly Sundays
programme.desc: Sonia feels frustrated that her doodle doesnt look the way she wants until she learns there is more to art that you can see.

programme.title: Silly Sundays
programme.desc: Hugo and Sonia find it difficult to keep cool on a warm day until they learn the value of keeping still.

programme.title: Silly Sundays
programme.desc: Sonia, Hugo, Mel and Poi make many fun discoveries while searching for a chirping cricket.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.sub-title: Dont Be Fooled By His Size
programme.desc: Tweety Bird uses his crane to lift stuff in this music video as he helps his crew get the job done.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi has a terrible no-good day after she keeps messing up and lets Joker get away. She doesnt think he can help Batgirl anymore, but a "bad today" doesnt mean itll be a "bad tomorrow".

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After refusing to practice with her new underwater mode, Batwing is unable to save Batman from Penguins sunken ship trap. The Batwheels must help Wing practice her submersible skills before she can save the day.

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: A music video introducing the villainous vehicle squad - The Legion of Zoom - introducing their shifty skills and pernicious personalities.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tuffy hires detectives Tom and Jerry to investigate the ghost hauntings in his house. At first Tom and Jerry think its just his imagination but discover that the house seems haunted. They find out its a rat who wanted to chase Tuffy out so he could live there with his family but is ok with sharing the home.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: If Tom isnt recovered from his injury before Rick and Ginger leave for their weekend getaway, Tom will be forced to stay at the Jolly Friends Pet Oasis, which is anything but jolly for Tom. Jerry goes to great lengths to tempt Tom to do anything but rest. After all, a weekend without Tom is a holiday for Jerry.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Little Quaker fears his luck will turn for the worse when he inadvertently walks under a ladder. When a series of unfortunate and painful incidents happen to Tom, Jerry and Spike, but not Little Quaker, he thinks he is to blame.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy pinches a magic statue from the Lemmings that has the power to make objects appear in real life. All you have to do, is pin the photo of ones desires upon it. Too bad for the rodents snow-bike! Grizzy replaces the vehicles photo with the portrait of his beloved she-bear who stayed behind in Canada. Barely arrived in African, the she-bear disappears again, victim of the rodents trickery. It is the outbreak of a bitter dispute.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Annoyed by the Lemmings new magnetic train, Grizzy propels the whole lot of them far from the cabin. The rodents land in the neighboring hut of a sorcerer and a mysterious mask falls onto one of them, endowing him with the power of telekinesis. The Lemmings are thrilled! They return to the cabin to explore this new magic power. Perched upon pieces of furniture, they fly around the room to finish their life-size flying train game!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy chases after the Lemmings, who have loaded a jar of Yummy into their remote-control driven car. Where the bear gets to the gas station, he destroys the vehicle and recovers the chocolate spread. The rodents find little mini-cars and chase Grizzy all the way back to the cabin, where they trip him up and intercept the coveted jar. Helpless, the bear sets out after them, until he runs into a tank truck filled with Yummy.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: To recover the jar of Yummy that Grizzy confiscated from them, the Lemmings decide to infest the bears coat with fleas. The scheme works and Grizzy starts scratching himself frenetically. Nonetheless, the bear manages to counter their diversion and expulse the rodents. When they land on a sorcerers hut, the Lemmings take possession of a magic scepter that has the ability to temporarily shrink objects. Now microscopic-sized, the rodents return to the cabin to get their paws on the chocolate spread.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy wakes up starving but the cupboards are empty. While the Lemmings play nearby with an elephant, the bear swipes their peanut reserves. Not at all pleased, the rodents decide to recover their bag of nuts and use the elephants trunk like a powerful vacuum cleaner to hurl all sorts of objects at Grizzy. In the heat of the battle, the Lemmings discover a pack of fabulous peanut and chili pepper cookies that seem to make the pachyderm ultra-powerful.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy is about to start eating the last remaining food in the cabin: cocktail snacks. But the sly Lemmings get there first. A fight breaks out but is quickly cut short by the unexpected visit of a wart hog. The pig devours the crackers and then, using his snout, detects a forgotten old package of candy under the bed, which he also proceeds to gobble down. Everyone realizes that the creature has the ability to find food. Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over who will follow the beast to track down food.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: In order to win a trophy filled with Yummy candies, Grizzy and the Lemmings take part in a safari photo competition on an animal reserve. They must capture the portraits of a number of wild animals that live in the park. It requires all their cunning to approach the elephant, wart hog and bat and take photos for the contest. But when it comes to the super-speedy, blue-necked ostrich, its a different kettle of fish!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: While Grizzy organizes a picnic alongside the pond, the Lemmings steal his jar of Yummy using water balls to discreetly advance underwater. Despite their equipment, the bear surprises the Lemmings and traps the rodents inside a waterproof ball which he throws far into the distance. An ostrich mistakes the ball for her egg and sits on it, waiting for the egg to hatch. The Lemmings are adopted by this new mother who is prepared to do anything to satisfy her offspring!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Chased by a raging elephant, Grizzy and the Lemmings are ejected from the cabin and land on a small nearby promontory. One of the rodents finds himself seated upon a throne-shaped boulder. A ray of sunlight illuminates him, and the savannah animals bow down before the Lemming king! But as soon as he leaves his royal seat, his powers disappear. Grizzy grabs the opportunity to plop down on the throne. Upon his orders, the other animals seek to provide him with every comfort, bringing the cabin, television and food closer. But the Lemmings put their feet down.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy is brutally awakened by four Lemmings who are giving a grand percussion concert near the cabin, while the rest of the group dances to the rhythm. The grumpy bear puts an end to the festivities by propelling the Lemmings into the distance. When they land, they discover a magical djembe inside the trunk of a baobab tree. When the percussionists start playing again, the Lemmings and all the other wild animals are possessed by the demon of dance!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: In the midst of a heat wave, Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the fridge. The rodents want to transform themselves into ice cubes to glide across their super curling ice slide, while Grizzy wishes merely to lie down inside the nice, cool appliance. After literally breaking the fridge in two, the Lemmings discover a container of refrigerant and create a new giant curling sheet in the savannah. But Grizzy has not given up the idea of resting in a cool spot!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy has gone all out for his dinner guest, the she-bear. But just as he is about to kiss her… Vroom! In the middle of a mad car race, the Lemmings wake him up with a jolt! Dragged out of his slumber and swept away upon a vehicle, Grizzy finishes the race in a daze. Not far away, the Lemmings find a mask that can control dreams. Once Grizzy gathers his wits, he wants only to get hold of the object and return to the she-bear of his dreams. But the Lemmings have other dreams, like high-powered racing cars.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a magic stick that functions as a Yummy divining rod. Grizzy steals their stick and finds a Yummy deposit in the savanna. To take control over Grizzys discovery, the Lemmings set a trap to draw the bear far from the deposit and transform it into an industrial chocolate factory. Grizzy will want to recover his chocolate deposit.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy uses insecticide and a fly swatter to get rid of vermin that are bothering him during his siesta. The Lemmings heal his last victim: a cute little insect they adopt as their house pet. Only problem, their starving mascot only eats wood! The cabin has lots of it, but when Grizzy realizes that an insect is eating his home from the inside, he takes drastic measures to eliminate it permanently.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy watches a documentary on salmon, whereas the Lemmings want to dance it up in the garage, nightclub style. TV versus music, the sonic war has begun! When a cloud passes overhead, Grizzy realizes that their respective gadgets run on electricity provided by solar panels. No more sun, no more electricity! He devises a plan whereby he will be the only one to access the energy, but the Lemmings have not said their last word!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput outsmarts the Docs by luring them onto a street basketball court and pitting them against the toughest ballerz in town. When the jocks look like utterly destroying poor old Specs and Skinny, Lamputs conscience kicks in. Our orange buddy decides to help the Docs out with some of that special brand of court magic. Fate is fickle, though - when it comes out that the Docs are using a performance-enhancing orange blob, the jocks call foul. Specs and Skinny are reminded yet again what it feels like to be dunked on.

programme.title: Superthings Rivals of Kaboom, Kazoom Power
programme.desc: Kid Fury faces Mr. Kings three challenges to prove his worth and show that he is the strongest.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom is framed for a crime he did not commit and is sent to prison. Jerry works to clear his name.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Because of an injured foot, Rick stays home with Gingers mother, Rosemary, taking care of him. Rosemary brings her infamous fat-free-dairy-free whole wheat gravy, and she quickly puts Rick, Spike and Tom on nutritious diets. Antics and fights break out as Rick and the pets crave real food.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry take a case for Toodles cousin in Hawaii, hoping to sneak in some rest and relaxation, but its no vacation. The cousins missing pineapple plant is only the starting place of the investigation as Tom and Jerry track down the culprit in this tropical environment.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom is chasing the mice around the haunted house when midnight strikes, and he finds himself face-to-face with a green-faced beast whos just as surprised to encounter Tom. Its soon revealed to be Toodles, whos a good witch brewing magic beauty products. Although Tom is enchanted at first, things stop going smoothly when he helps with her potions.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: After entering Tyke in an agility contest, Spike sets up a course for the puppy in the backyard. Soon, Spike decides the course isnt hard enough and gets Tom to help, bending Tom into pretzel-like positions for Tyke to leap over, through, or into. After all this preparation, Tyke must still make it to the competition on time.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Little Quacker finds that his favorite birdbath is cracked he enlists Jerrys help to get it fixed. They get sidetracked by the scent of Toms delicious chinese takeout. After a battle for the food Tom steals Little Quackers fortune cookie and gets the best fortune ever! Tom sets out into the world with his newfound luck only to be on the receiving end of miserable luck.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean wants to avoid lunch with Irmas Mum at all costs. He persuades Mrs. Wicket to let him join her on a coach trip to a concert - but he has to disguise himself as an old-aged pensioner or he wont be allowed on the coach. Once on the coach Bean drives everyone mad with his anti-boredom antics.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean is showing Irma his favourite tree in the park one day when he discovers a tree surgeon getting ready to cut it down. He darts up the tree and wont come back down. Irma loves this new side of Bean-ey! The tree surgeon is frustrated and tries various ploys to get Bean down. But can Bean make it to the toilet without being discovered and still save that tree?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket is persuaded by a jaunty estate agent to put her house up for sale. Bean is distraught - where will he live? Not Mrs. Wickets problem. Bean decides to hi-jack the sales process in order to deter all potential buyers - even if it means turning the whole house upside down!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants to learn skateboarding but hurts himself on his first try. Meanwhile Miss Wince is showing off her new mobility scooter at Mrs. Wickets. Bean is entranced. He could do wicked "ollies" with that! He absconds with a souped-up scooter and heads straight to the skate park ready to challenge Bruiser Senior and Junior …

Grizzy has no other choice but to requisition the Lemmings propulsion game to recover his possession. But try and make a Lemming understand that!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy has got it into his head to offer a butterfly to the she-bear hes in love with. But the Lemmings fight with him over the rare specimens hes spotted, for they want to play helicopter. The butterfly hunt is on!

He watches the Lemmings vain attempts to open the safe with amusement, until he realizes that the string around his neck with the key is far from indestructible.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy is impressed by the TV show of a magician who transforms a partridge into a bouquet of flowers. To get rid of the Lemmings once and for all, for they exasperate him with their incessant games, Grizzy tries the magic trick on them. And apparently... it works!

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi guides the audience through an interactive workout featuring jumping, spinning, and other athletic feats!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Kitty is staying over at the Batcave for a sleepover, but getting her to lie down for a catnap is no easy task as the Batwheels have to find creative ways to get her to sleep.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird learns a lesson in asking for permission when he takes one of Buffs stuffed animals without asking. When the stuffed animal accidentally gets swiped by the Legion of Zoom, Redbird will have to rescue the stuffed unicorn or admit to Buff what he did.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Bam is covered in super bouncy Bounce X goo during a chase with Prank, he must learn to embrace and use his newfound bouncing abilities to his advantage if hes going to put a stop to Pranks latest scheme.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bam must learn to adapt and try something new as hes tasked to dive the Bat Big Rig all the way to Star City, while the Legion of Zoom chases after him.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Prince Lionel of England hires The Looney Builders to build him a party room for his birthday, then proceeds to boss the crew around.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Penelope Pussycat to build a fashion runway in France where they are encouraged to make their design bigger and more fun.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Chef Poyung Panda hires The Looney Builders to build her a Dim Sum bus in China. The crew faces a major setback and Bugs worries about letting down his favorite chef.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: As The Looney Builders build a giant claw game for Chibi Critters arcade in Japan, they discover the claw part is broken.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Ginger brings home a kitten that she will foster until she finds it a home. Everyone in the house falls in love with the kitten, except for Tom. When Spike and Jerry see that Tom has become a bad influence on the kitten, a knock-down, drag-out, dust-up ensues. The only thing that ends it is news that the kitten has a new home.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Fed up with Toms cat hair, Rick buys the Suck-Up, a robot vacuum cleaner. The Suck-Up patrols the house and cleans 24/7. At first, Tom enjoys the little modern mechanical marvel using it to clean Jerry out of house and home! But when the self-programming Suck-Up turns on them both and takes over the house, Tom and Jerry team up to defeat it.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: The storm of the century is brewing, at least according to Tuffy and Jerry who are giving a little pay-back to Tom for tormenting them earlier. Spike gets caught up in the hysteria over the impending storm, too. When Spike uncovers the ruse, the mice must brace for their own storm.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Its picture day for Spike and Tom! Spike and Tom both end up covered in mud and in the Laundro-mutt grooming van. A fight leads to a runaway van and a bath they both wanted to avoid. Tuffy and Jerry are determined to be included in this years picture.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Rick blames Tom for letting a cricket into the house and tells him he must get rid of it or hell be sleeping outside. After Tom nearly destroys the house trying to get rid of the cricket, both the cricket and Tom are thrown outside where the chirping insect soon becomes Spikes problem.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom is determined to hijack the fun Jerry and Tuffy are having with making paper airplanes. Toms hijinks take a turn for the worse when he realizes hes made a paper airplane out of Gingers great-great grandmothers treasured fruitcake recipe.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: The Ryder family completes a drill in the event of a Starquake. Shields are deployed around Home and Dads museum on the moon. The drill is a success but the shield on the moon is stuck open.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: When Ella borrows Slippys luckiest good luck charm, she risks losing it forever when she finds herself at a black hole. Its only when everyone pools their strengths together that Mooncake is returned to Slippy, safe and sound.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Its Ellas moms birthday! Determined to get her mom the bestest birthday gift ever, Ella searches the Galaxy with help from her friends. But with time running out, shell have to realize that the best gift of all may not come wrapped in a box...

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: When a prized possession goes missing, Slippys sure the mysterious Alien Silicon Jellyfish took it! Ellas pretty sure the Jellyfish doesnt exist... but as the gang hunts for it, Ella learns that supporting her friend is what matters most!

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: On the eve of Dad opening his museum of human artifacts on the moon, Ella and Slippy help him by "fixing" a lunar rover until it drives off, with Glitch on board! Determined to fix this themselves, our gang understands its best to admit your mistake and ask for help.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Ratty boasts that he could take The Rats Nest out on a big adventure into the wide ocean but when his friends encourage him to follow his dream, he reluctantly feels compelled to leave the riverbank.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Its spring and Mole is whitewashing his burrow. His friends come to help while the watching weasels spy an opportunity to play a prank on them.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Ratty takes his friends out for a boat trip and insists as Captain, what he says goes. But when the boat is scuppered on the rocks, he finds that listening to his friends is the way to save the day.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: When Toad resolves to live the simple life and camp by the riverbank, the weasels take the opportunity to take over Toad Hall. Can Toad now ever return?

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Toad enlists his friends to help him make a superhero movie but his overbearing ego means they soon leave him to his own devices. But when the Weasels trick him, he finds himself in a pickle without his friends to help.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean discovers Mrs. Wickets nephew and Bruiser Jnr swapping football stickers and decides that he wants to fill up a sticker album too. He buys-up all the stickers in the neighbourhood and has almost completed his task when Nephew points out that hes missing one: the famous sticker owned by local footballing celebrity Jamie Studds. Bean turns thief to be the best collector of em all.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean thinks hes just dug up a valuable coin in the back-garden and goes rushing off to the Museum to have it valued little knowing that its actually Bruiser Snrs much-loved but valueless fake gold medallion. Bruiser Snr wants it back; and forces Bean to break back into the Museum to get it.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean discovers Declan giving Irma a lift in his swanky new SUV. Bean is unimpressed until Declan shows off all the cars features. Undeterred Bean professes his car superior. Declan issues a challenge - to see which car Irma will choose for her lift back to work. Bean decides his car may need a little "pimping" …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wickets Nephew is staying with her when he wins two tickets to an Outward Bound course. She refuses to go but then ropes in Bean to look after the child. The two start a competition to see who will win the trophy. Bean is a relentless competitor winning everything up until the point things start getting out of hand …

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: The Ryder family completes a drill in the event of a Starquake. Shields are deployed around Home and Dads museum on the moon. The drill is a success but the shield on the moon is stuck open.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: When Ella borrows Slippys luckiest good luck charm, she risks losing it forever when she finds herself at a black hole. Its only when everyone pools their strengths together that Mooncake is returned to Slippy, safe and sound.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Its Ellas moms birthday! Determined to get her mom the bestest birthday gift ever, Ella searches the Galaxy with help from her friends. But with time running out, shell have to realize that the best gift of all may not come wrapped in a box...

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: When a prized possession goes missing, Slippys sure the mysterious Alien Silicon Jellyfish took it! Ellas pretty sure the Jellyfish doesnt exist... but as the gang hunts for it, Ella learns that supporting her friend is what matters most!

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: On the eve of Dad opening his museum of human artifacts on the moon, Ella and Slippy help him by "fixing" a lunar rover until it drives off, with Glitch on board! Determined to fix this themselves, our gang understands its best to admit your mistake and ask for help.

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: Take to the skies over Gotham with Batwing and her friend best jet-friend Goldie the Arrowplane!

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Ratty boasts that he could take The Rats Nest out on a big adventure into the wide ocean but when his friends encourage him to follow his dream, he reluctantly feels compelled to leave the riverbank.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Its spring and Mole is whitewashing his burrow. His friends come to help while the watching weasels spy an opportunity to play a prank on them.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Ratty takes his friends out for a boat trip and insists as Captain, what he says goes. But when the boat is scuppered on the rocks, he finds that listening to his friends is the way to save the day.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: When Toad resolves to live the simple life and camp by the riverbank, the weasels take the opportunity to take over Toad Hall. Can Toad now ever return?

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Toad enlists his friends to help him make a superhero movie but his overbearing ego means they soon leave him to his own devices. But when the Weasels trick him, he finds himself in a pickle without his friends to help.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a giant jelly cake. Their chase leads them to the castle library, where the Lemmings accidentally activate the opening of a secret passage. The hidden room conceals numerous volumes of magic books. When opened, each book makes the story content or characters appear in real life. The bear and the rodents covet the same work: one with dessert recipes!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy chases the Lemmings throughout the castle to swipe the delicious jelly cake they were about to eat. He locks them inside a closet and makes off with the dessert. In the closet, the rodents discover a card that enables them to teleport the magic piece of furniture. They free themselves and recover the cake out from under the stunned bears nose. Grizzy understands that hes been tricked, but will he let things go at that?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.sub-title: The Bear, the Frog and the Mosquito
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun bouncing off the backs of harmless green frogs while Grizzy chases some mosquitos buzzing around him in vain. When he understands that the Lemmings amphibians eat these insects, he requisitions their mounts. Displeased, the rodents replace Grizzys green frogs with poisonous orange ones that paralyze anyone who touches them!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: While climbing back to the cabin carrying a load of delicious berries, Grizzy trips and falls over backwards. He performs a series of acrobatics worthy of a diving champ and resurfaces safe and sound despite himself. The Lemmings, who saw everything, are in awe and treat Grizzy like an idol. Grizzy starts to enjoy this VIP treatment until the Lemmings ask him to repeat his exploit. Grizzy agrees but discovers that the Lemmings have built a giant diving board for the occasion.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings lose their jar of chocolate spread in a labyrinthian Temple. Determined to recover their favorite afternoon snack, they confront one another in the maze, but end up getting totally lost. Grizzy finds himself back at square one and decides to find something to make holes in the walls and cheat. As for the Lemmings, they discover a magic map of the place that enables you to orient yourself and modify the corridors in real time. Which cheater will win?

programme.title: Superthings Rivals of Kaboom, Kazoom Power
programme.desc: Kid Fury faces Mr. Kings three challenges to prove his worth and show that he is the strongest.

programme.title: Silly Sundays
programme.desc: Sonia feels frustrated that her doodle doesnt look the way she wants until she learns there is more to art that you can see.

programme.title: Silly Sundays
programme.desc: Hugo and Sonia find it difficult to keep cool on a warm day until they learn the value of keeping still.

programme.title: Silly Sundays
programme.desc: Sonia, Hugo, Mel and Poi make many fun discoveries while searching for a chirping cricket.

programme.title: Karbikool
programme.desc: The bugs talk about times they felt disappointed.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.sub-title: Save the Bat Dance for Me
programme.desc: Redbird is convinced that nobody likes his eccentric dance moves, but when Toyman traps Robin behind a dance-themed gauntlet, its up to the rambunctious rally car to dance his way to victory.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After Nightbike reveals that hes afraid of loud noises, the Batwheels help him overcome his fear so he can stop The Penguin from strealing some valuable cargo.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings happen on a native American Indian burial place under the rangers cabin. When they accidentally activate a magic disk representing the earth, they are sent back in time to the prehistoric era...

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a bottle containing a love potion anyone who drinks it immediately falls in love with the first creature he sees. Grizzy already imagines himself becoming irresistible in the eyes of his beloved she-bear. But that is without taking into account the Lemmings clumsiness and their rodeo caribou drinking the magic potion.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings notice that Grizzy moves away from the jar of chocolate spread whenever he chases the fly buzzing around him. But the insect can never hold out long enough for the Lemmings to swipe the jar before being knocked out. They decide to give the fly intensive sports training.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Beans landlady is hopping mad on finding molehills on her lovely croquet lawn. Bean looks to get hammered if he does not rid the old lady of the cuddly little half-blind culprit. He fails dismally with his eccentric mole extermination methods and ends up simply taking the pesky rodent for a ride.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Beans tranquillity is shattered by deafening roadworks outside his bedroom window. Threats, sabotage and subterfuge all fail to quell the cacophony until Bean has the ingenious idea of feeding the workmen into peaceful submission. But the silence ends with a bang!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wickets nephew. He decides he must have his own console, only to discover how expensive they are. But as luck would have it, he arrives at the shop at closing time to discover that tomorrow there will be a special sale. All he has to do is be first in line …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair. He is forced to dress up as Mrs. Wicket when Brian the Delivery Man wont deliver the chair to anyone but Mrs. Wicket. Then Brian falls in love with "her" and asks "her" out on a date. Bean accepts because hes starving hungry. How long can he keep up the deception? Long enough to fill his stomach?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean dog-sits for Irma and while in the park comes across a professional dog-walker. This guys making a fortune while Bean is doing it for free! That evening posters go up and the next morning Bean has four dogs to look after. But who is going to walk whom?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean ends up in a farm slurry pit after racing a tractor. The car smells, Teddy smells, Bean smells … bad. He comes home, determined to clean all three. A determination that winds up with him locked outside, on the roof and completely stark naked.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Its Irmas birthday. Bean buys a bargain-bin load of cards, and writes out two - one nice, one silly. He gets his envelopes mixed up and sends off the wrong card. He tries to persuade the postman to hand the card back, but no luck. He winds up causing chaos at the sorting office in a last-ditch attempt to avoid Irmas ire.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean breaks his bed using it as a trampoline. He tries to fix it, but he cant. Next morning, and after an awful nights sleep, he goes to buy a brand-new bed. He has fun trying all the beds out, but the one he wants is too expensive. He is about to get thrown out of the shop when he turns his experience of all the beds to his advantage.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean drives her and Miss Wince to their booked spa retreat; and wait outside in the car until theyre done. Bean gets bored, so bored that he decides to sneak into the spa and get Mrs. Wicket and Miss Wince out. Chased by the irate Receptionist, Bean gets more than he bargained for when he crashes into Mrs. Wickets massage session.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan into raising money for the local donkey sanctuary. He tries to thwart Declans success and increase the amount of money hes raising until eventually he finds himself challenging Declan to a sky-diving competition.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The Great Eduardo, violinist supreme, is in town and Irma wants to go to the concert. But Bean wont pay for the tickets. More than that, he claims that he can play the violin better. Now he has to prove it. After a lot of painful sawing, even Eduardo cant bear the noise. He offers to teach Bean, who ends up replacing him in the concert!

programme.title: Ole ikka lahe, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Shaggy takes the gang to the Minor League Baseball stadium of his youth only to learn that its about to be shut down because a Ghostly Baseball Player is scaring away the fans - and the team! Shaggy puts aside his cowardly ways to save his home team but will Scooby stand by his, now not-so-scared, pal?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput has escaped yet again, and yet again, Specs and Skinny are in serious trouble with the Boss. Hes so fed up with their constant failure that he hires an out-of-towner: a super cool, hi-tech Doc who has all the moves and the attitude to match. The new guys hip to all of Lamputs tricks, and before long, the shape shifting blob is safely back at the Lab. Specs and Skinny, robbed of their whole gig, end up on the streets, while Rival Doc gets all the glory. With glory comes blame, though, and when Lamput stages yet another signature crafty escape, the Boss turns all his fury on Rival Doc. Who hired this guy, anyway!? Lamput just wants things to be how they were. The orange blob helps the Docs get back their jobs at the Lab, Rival Doc is sent packing, and Lamput prepares yet another daring escape.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Tired of the daily chores at home, Lamput buys a bottle of Super-Strength potion from a roadside salesman! A happy and super-strong Lamput now wraps up his chores with extra ease! When the Docs sneak up to catch him, they get accidentally knocked out by Lamput. Finally, the Docs realize Lamputs secret! They steal the biggest bottle of Super-Strength potion and pour it all over themselves. The Docs super-actions backfire and eventually land them in jail - all this with Lamput blissfully unaware of all that happened!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Skinny might be a man of science, but hes more than happy to get his fortune told for a laugh. The palm-reader sees alarming visions of Skinnys near future; mostly visions that relate to Skinny being squashed, smooshed or otherwise smeared. Its kind of Skinnys own fault; maybe if he paid a bit less attention to chasing Lamput and a bit more attention to not getting squashed, smooshed or smeared, he wouldnt need constant rescuing by a frazzled mystic.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs go out en masse to catch Lamput, there is a mishap with a bucket of grey paint, and no-one notices the extra Doc on the van-ride back to the Lab. Lamput-in-disguise is overwhelmed by the scale of the Labs operations - but soon enough proves to be pretty sharp at this Doc business. To catch a Lamput, youve gotta think like a Lamput, see. Lamputs so good at science-ing that soon enough poor old Specs and Skinny are sacked with extreme prejudice. Lamput cant stand watching his old buddies kicked out on the street. If only folks would believe the newest Doc: under this grey exterior, there beats a heart as orange as orange can be.

programme.desc: Joonisfilm raagib grislikarust nimega Grizzy ja mitmest lemmikust.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Beans sweet tooth leads him to despair when he bites off a bit more than he can chew. He is tormented by the toothache from Hell - and embarks on a hilarious mission to pull out this menace. Beans DIY attempts fail to succeed, and he is left with no other choice but to visit the dreaded dentist. But can Bean brave the Dentists chair? Or will the dentist despair when faced with Beans antics?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: After (accidentally) rescuing a kitten from a tree Mr. Bean is set to have his picture in the newspaper! The photographer arrives with the grateful lady cat owner, the scene is set, smiles all round…but then disaster strikes when Bean is continually upstaged by… his hair.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is trying to impress some kids in the park with his football skills but winds up kicking their ball into a dilapidated, scary-looking house. He has to go in and get it back. A feral cat living inside decides to steal Teddy, and in the chase around the insides of the house Bean manages something not even a wrecking ball can do.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean accidentally spills all of Mrs. Wickets new, expensive perfume on the floor. In an attempt to hide his crime and refill the empty bottle, he tries to recreate the smell - by adding all sorts of odd and strange ingredients. He might be able to fool Mrs. Wicket, but can he fool Scrapper and all the neighbourhood cats?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is on his way to the seaside when the mini runs out of petrol. Undeterred he manages to get a push, but for some reason the do-gooders dont want to push him all the way to the beach! Instead he uses wind power, piggy backs on a car transporter and 802harnesses up some horses to try and get to his destination.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Scrapper gives Bean fleas and Bean is forced to call in the pest control person. His flat will take 24 hours to fumigate. Bean begs Mrs. Wicket to let him stay with her. She agrees as long as Bean helps her with cooking cleaning etc. 24 hours later and Bean is desperate to see the back of her. The feeling is mutual. But then Mrs. Wicket starts itching …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is out shopping when it starts to rain. Taking refuge in a trendy coffee bar Bean is fascinated both by the brewing machinery and the amount of money people will pay for small cups of coffee! Scenting a fortune to be made Bean opens up his own strange successful coffee bar …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wakes up on a freezing cold winters morning to discover that the boiler is broken and no sign of the repairman. He tries increasingly ridiculous ways to warm up his tea his toothpaste and himself before venturing out to discover somewhere to hunker down and get warm.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Irma wants a romantic break; Bean doesnt. Its too expensive. Irma kidnaps Teddy and refuses to give him back unless Bean promises to take her to Paris. Caught between his inability to pay and his love of Teddy Bean doesnt know what to do! Until he spots a cat beauty competition in which first prize is a romantic break in Paris - if only he can catch Scrapper …

programme.title: Silly Sundays
programme.desc: When Hugo and Sonia cant find the final piece to their jigsaw, they come up with a creative solution to finish their puzzle.

programme.title: Silly Sundays
programme.desc: When Sonia cant sleep, Hugo, Mel and Poi, Mom, Dad and Granny help her to find the reason why.

programme.title: Silly Sundays
programme.desc: Sonia and Hugos baby friends bring chaos to their game until they learn why babies play in a different way.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Tweety spots a giant lemon in a tree and is determined to make lemonade for everyone.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After agreeing to swap motherboards and change bodies, the Batwheels have to quickly learn to "drive a mile in each others wheels" in time to stop the approaching Legion of Zoom!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi has some competition with Nightwings motorcycle, Nightbike. Always trying to one-up each other, these stunt bikes will need to learn that theyre better when they work together.

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: Surf-riding musical mayhem with Batman, Robin, and the Batwheels!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When it seems like Spike has developed an allergic reaction to Tom, Rick buys Ginger a hypoallergetic cat named Glory.At first it seems like shes too good to be true, but shes secretly making Spike, Tom and Jerry miserable. The three team up to get rid of Glory, but shes more cunning than she looks.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom, Jerry and Butch watch a Smack-n-Cheese Cheesy Cheese Puffs advertisement and when they hear, "supplies are running out!", the rivalry between the trio reaches new heights as they compete to get what they imagine to be the very last bag of Smack-n-Cheese Cheesy Cheese Puffs.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Jerrys Uncle Harry is coming for a visit. Tuffys excited to meet the great uncle he has heard so much about. Harry craves a respite from his life as a nomad on the party cruise ship circuit, but it doesnt take him long to realise that life on the high seas has its advantages (specifically, not being holed-up with Tom)!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A confrontation between Grizzy and the Lemmings leads to a room in the castle tower. The bear accidentally sets off a mechanism and discovers a large medieval magic trunk. Indeed, when placed inside, the trunk can blend two objects into one! The Lemmings are quicker and get their hands on the trunk, then set out to play with objects they have enhanced. But its Grizzy who discovers the formula that makes you ultra-powerful.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: When the Lemmings spoil Grizzys meal with their new game, the bear evicts them far from the cabin. They crash onto a faraway picnic table. All except one, who bounces off some jelly pudding which was left behind. When the Lemmings discover its highly spongy texture, they invent a whole bunch of new bouncing games. But Grizzy, starving and dinner-deprived, has his eyes on the dessert!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings are holding a log throwing competition that stops short when Grizzy sends them soaring into the distance. The rodents land upon an ancient Celtic site where they happen upon a magic bracelet that increases the strength of whoever wears it tenfold. The Lemmings start the competition over with their new power, only this time using menhirs! A witness to the scene, Grizzy longs for the magic object and imagines everything he could do with the piece of jewelry.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the TV remote control. The argument leads the bear to the summit of the castle tower during a storm. In a secret room, he glimpses a human form by the light of a lightning bolt. Terrified, Grizzy unwittingly sets off a mechanism which had been activated by the lightning, and which brings to life a medieval armor. The living armor bows before the flabbergasted bear. Grizzy has just found a docile and fearsome ally with whom to combat the Lemmings!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a whale of a time revamping the paintings on display in the castle by painting themselves alongside the illustrated noblemen. But Grizzy wants to paint himself on the next painting and swipes the artwork along with the rodents paint kit. The furious Lemmings are determined to recover their material at all costs. Its the beginning of a dispute that could be qualified as… artsy!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings improvise a trampoline with bagpipes, only each jump is accompanied by a deafening outburst. Grizzy steps in and hurls the object far from the castle. The rodents catch up with it on a mystical nearby isle, where they meet five fairies. One of them breathes life into the musical instrument. The Lemmings return to the castle with five sets of enchanted pipes and catapult Grizzy far away. Its his turn to discover the mysterious isle.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy puts a stop to the Lemmings furious rodeo game on a sheep. Annoyed, they decide to banish the bear to the bottom of the castle dungeons while hes taking a nap. In his prison, Grizzy finds a magic shepherds crook. Now he can direct the neighboring sheep according to his desires. With their help, he manages to escape from his dungeon. He returns to the cabin and settles in on the flock like on a sofa, while the Lemmings stare in disbelief!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: While fighting over a jelly cake, Grizzy banishes the Lemmings to the castle dungeons and the rodents discover a passageway leading to a secret elfin room. The Lemmings activate a secret mechanism, transforming their surroundings into a "heroic fantasy" world where they are elves, the sheep are goblins, and Grizzy is a magician. The jelly cake battle now takes on epic dimensions!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings take Polaroid snapshots of themselves disguised outside the castle along with a sheep who poses with them. But smelling the scent of Grizzys cookies in the cabin, the sheep abandons them. The bears heart is softened by the little ball of wool and consents to share (some of) his snack. He pampers the creature and grows fond of it, but the rodents want their pal back!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy is pulled out of his dreams by the rambunctious Lemmings who are jousting on sheep. The sly bear gets rid of the rodents by enticing their mounts away with food. Irritated, the Lemmings scheme to remove the bear from the castle during his nap and prevent him from ever returning. Furious at being banished, the bear prepares his revenge, armed with a catapult.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: With a ring that lets their astral bodies travel, the Lemmings decide to haunt Grizzy.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a giant jelly cake. Their chase leads them to the castle library, where the Lemmings accidentally activate the opening of a secret passage. programme.desc: Grizzy chases the Lemmings throughout the castle to swipe the delicious jelly cake they were about to eat. He locks them inside a closet and makes off with the dessert. In the closet, the rodents discover a card that enables them to teleport the magic piece of furniture. They free themselves and recover the cake out from under the stunned bears nose. Grizzy understands that hes been tricked, but will he let things go at that?

programme.title: Superthings Rivals of Kaboom, Kazoom Power
programme.desc: During training at the Hero Base, the SuperThings mistake Kid Fury for a villain because of his yellow eyes.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Ginger and Ricks vegetable garden is growing, and they need a way to keep out the gophers. Ginger says traps are cruel, but Tom can handle the task! However, things start getting out of hand when a lady gopher falls in love with Jerry, and the two plan a garden raid together.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Skullie tells Tom that he wont have to sweat a visit from one of the spooks tonight. However, Tom is soon drawn to a full-length mirror that causes no shortage of trouble. As he gets pulled into the mirror, an evil reflection cat trades places with him. Tuffy and Jerry enter the mirror world too and must fight their reflection selves for survival.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Stinker, the trash-loving dog, comes by looking for help, Tom and Jerry arent inclined to take the case until they hear it involves a missing fortune. So, theyre disappointed when they find out Stinker is searching for a lost fortune cookie from his Chinese takeout to learn his fate. Retracing the dogs steps, they chase the fortune cookies trail through town.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: After Tyke digs up, Hammy, Spikes lucky bone, Spike reburies it right away because its bad luck to remove it. Soon afterward, Tom gets a set of toy dog bones that do tricks, and he teases Spike and Tyke with them. When the whirly-bone buries itself and unearths Hammy for a second time, Spike recruits the other animals to help prevent the bad luck he expects.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: A ghost paints a flattering portrait of Tom, but Tom is stingy with his payment and the ghost casts a spell on the portrait. Strange things start happening as the portrait absorbs injuries and calories that should be affecting Tom. However, soon Jerry and Tuffy figure out whats going on and use it to their advantage.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Its the hottest day ever and Spike is building a swimming pool for his son Tyke. When Tom and Jerry get kicked out of the house for being too destructive Spike enlists their help.
